name: BlackSmart
0:
”Alexa, unlock the front door.”
”Alexa, lock my door lock.”
”Alexa, lock door lock”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Detailed Description


Hardware Requirements:
1.Bridge-sold separately
2.Echo/Dot

Get Started:

1. Check that the BLACK app is able to lock/unlock using Bluetooth.

2. Check that the BLACK app is able to "remotely" lock/unlock using the Sciener Plus hub.

3. Enable the BlackSmart Home skill in Alexa.

4. Link the BLACK account and provide permission to access your locks.

5. Once Alexa discovers the Lock, you can issue voice commands to Alexa as outlined below

Alexa, lock the door lock(door lock is the name of smart lock,you can rename the smart lock in the BLACK app)
Alexa, unlock the door lock(you should enable unlock feature in Alexa app)

Notice:some locks dose not support unlock or lock status report, the status will be locked.
